summary: Adam Murphy - a real-estate hotshot and confirmed bachelor - feels the burn of failed love(s), when a social disease takes him face-to-face with a handful of one-night stands, revealing the shortcomings of his own image.
cast: Paulo Costanzo|Ingrid Haas|Tyler Labine|John Cho|Rukiya Bernard|Jay Brazeau|Emily Hampshire|Julia Benson|Jordana Largy|Aria DeMaris|Carrie Anne Fleming|Chris Britton|Dalila Bela|Ona Grauer|Kai Donily|Chiara Zanni|Ryan Beil|Carrie Ruscheinsky|Ariel Ladret|Lucie Guest|Danielle Stott-Roy|Deighen Allen Greene|Diana Bang|Daesha Danielle Usman|Kendahl Cardinal|Samantha Simmonds
keywords: writer director producer|looking at oneself in a mirror|woman wears a fencing suit|woman wears only a man's shirt|woman wears eyeglasses
title: That Burning Feeling
